name: Zaxterion: Space Frenzy!
description:
NOTE FROM THE SOLO DEVELOPER:

Now in my 5th year of developing games for Steam, I'm proud to offer Zaxterion as my 10th title! Expect Zaxterion to offer addictive and old school arcade action that keeps it simple, yet is very fun to play and something you'll want to play again and again!


GAMEPLAY:

* Your ship is caught in an endless asteroid storm in the depths of space and your ship simply cannot stop moving forward! While you can throttle your speed slower and faster to help you maneuver, steering your ship left and right will likely be your best options to survive.

* Ammo and health bits can be collected while flying around, but collecting gold found in the asteroids will be your best way to purchase health and an assortment of power-ups from your mother ship which will visit you on occasion.

* Try to beat your friends and Steam users the world over by chasing the top scores on the Steam high score list!
